title: the buff of rising sun
body:
« There is a buff in the  New rift
They call the Rising Sun.
And it's been the ruin of many a poor champ,
And God, I know I'm one.

My mother was a seller,
She craft my new stalker's blade.
My father was a jungler,
Down in the New rift.

Now the only thing a jungler needs,
Is a machete and smite
And the only time he's satisfied
Is when he's on a killing spree.

Oh botlane tell your jungler,
Not to do what I have done
Spend your lives in brush and gank,
In the buff of the Rising Sun.

Well, I got one foot on the fountain,
The other foot on the lane,
I'm goin' back to the New rift
To make that gank.

There is a buff in the New rift
They call the Rising Sun.
And it's been the ruin of many a poor champ,
And God, I know I'm one. »

replies.body: mi annoiavo e non avevo molto da fare ,spero vi piaccia, se vedete errori  o se volete dare consigli fatelo senza problemi.
